summary: Client requested Sarah to start a requirements meeting. The PM asked for a project name; Architect, Developer, and QA did not provide input (not_addressed).

actions.task: Start the requirements meeting as requested by the client
Propose a name for the project
Follow up to solicit input from Architect, Developer, and QA on requirements

risks.risk: Key stakeholders (Architect, Developer, QA) did not provide input, risking incomplete requirements or delays.
risks.mitigation: Follow up with stakeholders to obtain their input, schedule a focused requirements session, and circulate an agenda and prework to ensure engagement.
